categories: Category:Battles of the early Imperial campaigns

nodes.text: The Siege of Trasemene was an Imperial victory, won by Grand Admiral Miltin Takel. Takel's use of glitterstim spice proved invaluable in obtaining that victory. In later years, the victory would be one of many that a player could simulate on Plescinia Entertainments' CS-Mark 10 Imperial Command Combat Simulator.
